page.title: 15Attitudes in Long Marton
page.content: Most people like living in our block. They say the people are friendly and helpful.They enjoy country life and the fresh air.They would not like the noise,crush and fumes in a big city. There are however,somethings they would like to change.Everybody said they would like to see less litter. They would like a better bus servise and a bigger playing field for the ch- ildren.Some would like a library and more shops. They would like to see pets kept under control rather than just left to wonder about and make a mess every- where. The station is closed at Long Mart- on but many people would like to see more regular local servise between Appleby and Carlisle for shopping or getting to the Technical Collage.Now no trains run at the right time.
